title: Carrera de Mente
description: Turn-based game where you have to guess the correct questions to climb to the top and win. Play along with up to 6 friends to find who is the smartest of all. With real-time actions and time, you will have to think fast to win.

title: Hola Mundo
description: Juego de preguntas y respuestas con temática de programación y tecnología en general para poner a prueba tus conocimientos y aprender de una forma divertida.
